sentence.Network_en: He has been brought up not to swear in front of women.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从小就被教育不要在女性面前说脏话。

sentence.Network_en: Many people swear by vitamin C's ability to ward off colds.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多人深信维生素C能预防感冒。

sentence.Network_en: I swear I've told you all I know.
sentence.Network_cn: 我发誓我已经把我所知道的全都告诉你了。

lj.lj_ly: his informant swore blind that the weapons were still there.
lj.lj_ls: 他的线人一口咬定说武器还在那里。

jx.jx_en_mean: (US Law)obtain the issue of (a warrant for arrest) by making a charge on oath
jx.jx_cn_mean: (美律)经宣誓保证所控属实后发给（拘捕证）

jx.jx_en_mean: To use abusive, violent, or blasphemous language against; curse.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 咒骂，诅咒：以肮脏、激烈或亵渎的语言辱骂；诅咒

jx.jx_en_mean: To have great reliance on or confidence in

lj.lj_ly: He swears by his personal physician.
lj.lj_ls: 他很信任他的私人医生

jx.jx_en_mean: To have reliable knowledge of; be sure of

lj.lj_ly: I think she said she was going to the library, but I couldn't swear by it.
lj.lj_ls: 我想她说过要去图书馆，但我不肯定

lj.lj_ly: He swore by all the angels and saints of heaven.
lj.lj_ls: 我以天堂中所有的天使和圣人的名义起誓

jx.jx_en_mean: To administer a legal or official oath to
To pledge to renounce or give up
To swear out (a warrant for arrest) by making a charge under oath.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 经宣誓保证属实后而获得（逮捕令）

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English swerian of Germanic origin; related to Dutch zweren, German schwören, also to answer

encyclopedia.content: 歌曲《Swear》简介 专辑中文名: Swear 歌手: alan 音乐风格: 流行 版本: 单曲 发行时间: 2009年11月4日 地区: 日本 语言: 日语专辑介绍 阿兰11th single「Swear」隆重推出，Swear的意思是「誓言，宣誓」，神圣的誓言，坚固的盟约！歌曲《Swear》是由alan初次出演的CM波路梦(ブルボン)「ブランチュールミ二シリーズ」TVCM的主题歌，清新欢快，扬抑青春的气息！在变化中的季节中，肯定可以达到热情和强韧的意志，真人大小的"现

entry.def: If someone swears, they use language that is considered to be rude or offensive, usually because they are angry.

example.ex: It's wrong to swear and shout...
They swore at them and ran off.
example.tran: 他们骂了他们后就跑掉了。

entry.def: If you swear to do something, you promise in a serious way that you will do it.

example.ex: Alan swore that he would do everything in his power to help us...
example.tran: 艾伦许诺要尽其所能帮助我们。

example.ex: We have sworn to fight cruelty wherever we find it...

entry.tran: 发誓，郑重声明，保证(所说属实)
entry.def: If you say that you swear that something is true or that you can swear to it, you are saying very firmly that it is true.

example.ex: I swear I've told you all I know...
example.tran: 我发誓我已经把我所知道的全都告诉你了。

example.ex: I swear on all I hold dear that I had nothing to do with this...
example.tran: 我以身家性命担保，我和这件事无关。

entry.tran: 使发誓，使承诺(保守秘密)
entry.def: If someone is sworn to secrecy or is sworn to silence, they promise another person that they will not reveal a secret.

example.ex: She was bursting to announce the news but was sworn to secrecy.
example.tran: 她急不可待想宣布这个消息，但却发过誓要守口如瓶。

sentences.sentence: "The drunken men were cursing loudly in the street"

means.word_mean: 2. to declare or affirm solemnly and formally as true;

sentences.sentence: "Before God I swear I am innocent"

means.word_mean: 4. make a deposition; declare under oath

example.en: Mrs. Wilson was known to swear like a trooper on occasion.
example.zh: 威尔逊太太有时会破口大骂是出了 名的。

auth_sentence.content: Fans swear they taste just like the real thing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fans swear they taste just like the real thing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fans swear they taste just like the real thing.

auth_sentence.content: He sounded like a Joyce character, I swear.
auth_sentence.res_content: He sounded like a Joyce character, I swear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He sounded like a Joyce character, I swear.

auth_sentence.content: Vinyl buffs swear that the sound is better.
auth_sentence.res_content: Vinyl buffs swear that the sound is better.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Vinyl buffs swear that the sound is better.

sentences.en: His boss often swore at him, sometimes for no reason at all.
sentences.cn: 老板经常骂他, 有时毫无理由。

sentences.en: I don't know anything about what happened, I swear.
sentences.cn: 我发誓, 我对所发生的事一无所知。

sentences.en: They swore an oath to carry out their duties faithfully.
sentences.cn: 他们宣誓忠实履行自己的职责。

sentences.en: He swore to obey the king.
He swore that he had put the papers in that drawer.
sentences.cn: 他发誓说, 他是把文件放在那个抽屉里的。

jushi.english: The man swore when the hammer hit his thumb.
jushi.chinese: 当那个男人的拇指被锤子砸了一下时,他大声咒骂起来。

jushi.english: Stop swearing; it is a bad habit.
